name: Raven Landscape
description:
Overview

This is a Halloween mini-game.

The player must survive all the waves. Each wave contains more enemies with unique abilities.

I hope you enjoy it! :)

You are welcome to drop your feedback on comments below. It will help to improve this and future games!

Technical details:
  • Version 1.1.0
    • Added Options Menu
  • Version 1.0.0
    • A few waves were added
    • 3 types of enemies
